name: Infernoid Attondel
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by banishing 2 "Infernoid" monsters from your hand or GY while the total Levels and Ranks of all Effect Monsters you control are 8 or lower. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can activate this effect; this card can make a second attack in a row. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it.
